subject: Bruce:
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Hey, I had a frustrating two days of working with just one 12-470 on 
direct record.  Today, I picked up your name probably 10 times.  I 
believe I am to contact you, either for a chat about this issue or 
about the box in general.

Can you send me an e-mail to talk by phone?  I'll also send you one 
requesting the same.  I appreciate your help...

LC
